name: kamigawa_neon_dynasty
description: Extensive templates covering NEO mechanics: Modified, Reconfigure, Ninjutsu, Channel, Sagas that transform, Vehicles & Pilots, Shrines, Artifact synergies, Samurai attack-alone rewards, and Ninja combat-damage triggers.

Artifact:
Reconfigure {X} ({X}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach this creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery.)
Equipped creature gets +{X}/+{X}.

Equipped creature has menace and gets +{X}/+0.
Reconfigure {X}

Equipped creature gets +0/+{X} and has reach.
Reconfigure {X}
Channel — Discard this card: Draw {X} cards.

Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater." This ability triggers only once each turn.

When this enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
Creature: As long as this creature is modified, it gets +{X}/+{X}. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
Whenever a modified creature you control attacks, {EFFECT_CHOICE}. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
Whenever this or another Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, tap up to one target creature. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.
Whenever a creature you control becomes modified, gain {X} life.
Sorcery: Put {X} +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains trample until end of turn. It becomes modified. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
Channel — Discard this card: Create {X} 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature tokens.
Create {X} 2/2 [TOKEN_COLOR] Samurai creature tokens with vigilance.
Enchantment: Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."

Legendary Enchantment Creature — Shrine
At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {X}. When you do, {SHRINE_EFFECT} for each Shrine you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1. Modified creatures you control get an additional +1/+1.
Instant: Channel — Discard this card: Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Land:
This enters the battlefield untapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
Channel — {X}{W}: Create two 2/2 [TOKEN_COLOR] Samurai creature tokens with vigilance.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +{X}/+{X} and has vigilance.
(This makes it modified.)

Enchant creature
When this Aura enters the battlefield, put {X} +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature has trample.
(This makes it modified.)
AuraLand:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {X}" and "{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery."
(This makes it modified.)

Ninjutsu {X}
Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

Ninjutsu {X}
Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
Whenever a Ninja or Rogue you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
Sorcery: Put {X} +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains trample until end of turn. It becomes modified. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

Look at the top {X} cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.
Instant: Channel — Discard this card: Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If you controlled a modified creature, draw a card.
Return target creature you control to its owner’s hand. It gains "This spell can’t be blocked this turn." until end of turn.

This enters the battlefield untapped.
